welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hakodate, Japan! Known for its stunning night views, delicious seafood, and rich history, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Lucky Pierrot (ラッキーピエロ)
restaurants.description: Lucky Pierrot (ラッキーピエロ) is a burger joint located in 函館市.
restaurants.address: 若松町8-8 (ホテルニューオーテ 2F), 函館市, 北海道, 040-0063

restaurants.name: Uni Murakami (うにむらかみ 函館本店)
restaurants.description: Uni Murakami (うにむらかみ 函館本店) is a seafood restaurant located in 函館市.

restaurants.name: Chamu (茶夢)
restaurants.description: Chamu (茶夢) is a seafood restaurant located in 函館市.

restaurants.name: Nemuro Hanamaru (根室花まる)
restaurants.description: Nemuro Hanamaru (根室花まる) is a sushi restaurant located in 函館市.
restaurants.address: 若松町20-1 (キラリス函館 B1F), 函館市, 北海道, 040-0063

restaurants.name: Kaikoubo (函館海鮮料理 海光房)
restaurants.description: Kaikoubo (函館海鮮料理 海光房) is a seafood restaurant located in 函館市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hakodate Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hakodate Airport serves as the gateway for travelers arriving from and departing to other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
